attributes.action: Suspend social distancing rules on Sunday 11th July for the Euro 2020 final
attributes.additional_details: The UK has experienced 16 months of painful sacrifice, with the rules set to change on Monday 19th, we deserve a special lieu day to support such an amazing achievement, and pubs deserve the business after complying so patiently with the endless measures.
attributes.background: On Wednesday 7th July, England beat Denmark 2-1 in the Semi Final of Euro 2020. We call on Boris Johnson and his government to suspend social distancing rules; including the rule of 6, table service only and face masks in all licenced pubs so fans across the country can cheer on the boys.

rejection.details: It can take up to 7 days for us to check petitions after they are published, so unfortunately it's now too late for your petition to be acted upon if it was published.
